title: Internet Identity sign-in/out HUD for Jungle Fury

requirements.summary: Add Internet Identity sign-in/out controls and authenticated status indicator to the in-game HUD using the existing useInternetIdentity hook.
acceptanceCriteria: The HUD includes a clearly labeled "Sign in" button when the user is anonymous.
Clicking "Sign in" calls the existing `useInternetIdentity().login()` flow (no custom auth implementation).
When the user is signed in, the HUD shows a "Sign out" button that calls `useInternetIdentity().clear()`.
The HUD shows a basic signed-in indicator (e.g., "Signed in" and the principal string or a shortened principal) when authenticated.
Authentication errors (from `loginStatus === "loginError"`) are displayed in the UI in English and are non-blocking to the rest of the app.

file_operations.description: Integrate Internet Identity UI into the HUD by consuming `useInternetIdentity()` to: (1) detect anonymous vs authenticated state, (2) render a clearly labeled "Sign in" button that calls `login()`, (3) render a "Sign out" button that calls `clear()`, (4) display a signed-in indicator including the user's principal (full or shortened), and (5) show a non-blocking English error message when `loginStatus === "loginError"` (e.g., from `loginError`).

requirements.summary: Ensure HUD user-facing text is English and remove emojis from the main game title.
acceptanceCriteria: The main game title renders as plain English text without emoji characters.
All newly added authentication UI labels and messages are in English.

file_operations.description: Update the main HUD title to remove emoji characters and ensure it renders as plain English text; also verify all authentication-related labels/messages added for sign-in/out and error display are English-only.
